name: Input Switcher
description: Adds hotkeys to swap between input modes. Type /inputswitch in game for more details.

name: Cooldown Tracker
description:
A convenient way to view your skill cooldowns. Includes text notifications, sound alerts, and chat message alerts. Type /cd in game for a list of commands.
Newest release in open beta. Added moving frames, buff tracking support, size scaling, and general performance improvements. IMPORTANT: Refer to the README on the website for information on commands.

name: Chat FX
description: Get the likes you know you deserve. Moving yellowtext. /!! <message>, disable with /!!
